config_schema.doc: AWS region where Bedrock is available
config_schema.name: region

config_schema.doc: Bedrock API key for simplified authentication (alternative to IAM credentials)
config_schema.name: api_key

config_schema.doc: AWS Access Key ID for IAM authentication
config_schema.name: access_key_id

config_schema.doc: AWS Secret Access Key for IAM authentication
config_schema.name: secret_access_key

config_schema.doc: AWS Session Token for temporary credentials
config_schema.name: session_token

config_schema.doc: Force use of Bedrock Converse API (default: auto-detect based on tools presence)
config_schema.name: use_converse

known_limitations: Tools not supported in streaming mode
Integer type coercion issues (integers >= 2^31 may be dropped)
Tool calls may be returned as JSON text strings instead of structured objects

nvidia.nemotron-nano-12b-v2.name: NVIDIA Nemotron Nano 12B v2 VL BF16
